tit.j: コミュニティバスやわた

sen.j: コミュニティバスやわたは、八幡市が運営するコミュニティバスで、京阪バスに運行委託を行っている。
sen.e: The Community Bus Yawata is the bus route managed by Yawata City, while Yawata City commissioned the Keihan Bus Co. Ltd. to operate the bus route.
The Community Bus Yawata is the bus route managed by Yawata City, while Yawata City commissioned the Keihan Bus Co. Ltd. to operate the bus route.
The Community Bus Yawata is the bus route managed by Yawata City, while Yawata City commissioned the Keihan Bus Co. Ltd. to operate the bus route.

sen.j: 本項では八幡市の実証実験路線である八幡市南北線についても記述する。
sen.e: This article also describes about the Yawata City North-South Bus Route established for testing and researching under the real-world evaluation.
sen.cmt: この文章作成時期にはまだ実証実験運行が終了していなかったように取れる文章となっています。ただ翻訳作業時現在はすでに運用期限が切れており、この文章を通じて現在形ではなく過去形としています。
sen.e: This article also describes about the Yawata City North-South Bus Route established for testing and researching for the substantiative experiment.
sen.cmt: for the substantiative experiment に訂正しました。
sen.e: This article also describes about the Yawata City North-South Bus Route established for testing and researching for the substantiative experiment.

sen.j: なお八幡市南北線は一般路線である。
sen.e: This Yawata City North-South Bus Route was the publicly demonstrated route.
sen.cmt: この文ですが、実証実験路線でありながら一般路線であるという意味が不明です。直訳に近いものになっており意味が通じるかどうかは微妙です。
sen.e: This Yawata City North-South Bus Route was the publicly demonstrated route.
This Yawata City North-South Bus Route was the publicly demonstrated route.

sen.j: コミュニティバスやわたは京阪バス男山営業所、八幡市南北線は京阪バス京田辺営業所の管轄である。
sen.e: The Community Bus Yawata is operated by the Keihan Bus Co. Ltd. Otokoyama Management Office, while the Yawata City North-South Bus Route is operated by the Keihan Bus Kyo-Tanabe Management Office.
The Community Bus Yawata is operated by the Keihan Bus Co. Ltd. Otokoyama Management Office, while the Yawata City North-South Bus Route is operated by the Keihan Bus Kyotanabe Management Office.
The Community Bus Yawata is operated by the Keihan Bus Co. Ltd. Otokoyama Management Office, while the Yawata City North-South Bus Route is operated by the Keihan Bus Kyotanabe Management Office.

sen.j: なお八幡市南北線は6月30日の運行を持って終了する。
sen.e: The Yawata City North-South Bus Route ceased its operation on June, 30, 2009.
sen.cmt: 原文には年度がふくまれていませんが、この項目後半に年度記載がありますので加えておきました。上述の通り、現時点では過去の事例ですので原文とは異なる過去形としています。
sen.e: The Yawata City North-South Bus Route ceased its operation on June, 30, 2009.
The Yawata City North-South Bus Route ceased its operation on June, 30, 2009.

sen.j: 沿革
sen.e: History
History
History

sen.j: 2005年2月6日 コミュニティバスやわたの運行開始。
sen.e: On February 6, 2005, the Community Bus Yawata began its operation.
On February 6, 2005, the Community Bus Yawata began its operation.
On February 6, 2005, the Community Bus Yawata began its operation.

sen.j: 2008年10月19日 八幡市南北線の運行開始（2009年3月31日まで実施予定）。
sen.e: On October 19, 2008, the Yawata City North-South Bus Route began its operation. (it was publicly operated as a real-world evaluation until March 31, 2009)
On October 19, 2008, the Yawata City North-South Bus Route began its operation (it was publicly operated as a real-world evaluation until March 31, 2009.)
sen.cmt: ピリオド位置を訂正しました。
sen.e: On October 19, 2008, the Yawata City North-South Bus Route began its operation (it was publicly operated as a real-world evaluation until March 31, 2009.)

sen.j: 2009年3月 南北線の試行運行終了。
sen.e: In March 2009, the test operation of the Yawata City North-South Bus Route was ended.
In March 2009, the test operation of the Yawata City North-South Bus Route was ended.
In March 2009, the test operation of the Yawata City North-South Bus Route was ended.

sen.j: 乗客数が目標に達しなかったため、6月まで運行を継続して廃止予定（『朝日新聞』南京都版 2009年3月5日付、八幡市役所の案内看板）
sen.e: Because the number of passengers did not meet the target estimate, the administration of the Yawata City North-South Bus Route decided to extend the test operation period until the end of June 2009, although the administration decided to discontinue the route after this testing period without re-launching the route as a regular service. ('The Asahi Shinbun (Newspaper)' South Kyoto Edition. The announcement by the Yawata City administration office posted at Yawata City City Hall on March 5, 2009)

Because the number of passengers did not meet the target estimate, the administration of the Yawata City North-South Bus Route decided to extend the test operation period until the end of June 2009, although the administration decided to discontinue the route after this testing period without re-launching the route as a regular service ('The Asahi Shinbun (Newspaper)' South Kyoto Edition: The announcement by the Yawata City administration office posted at Yawata City City Hall on March 5, 2009).
sen.cmt: ピリオド位置を訂正しました。: に訂正しました。
sen.e: Because the number of passengers did not meet the target estimate, the administration of the Yawata City North-South Bus Route decided to extend the test operation period until the end of June 2009, although the administration decided to discontinue the route after this testing period without re-launching the route as a regular service ('The Asahi Shinbun (Newspaper)' South Kyoto Edition: The announcement by the Yawata City administration office posted at Yawata City City Hall on March 5, 2009).

sen.j: 平日（市役所の開庁日）の運行日は、八幡市役所の玄関前に停車する。
sen.e: The buses operated during weekdays (working days of the City Hall) stop by at the entrance gate of the Yawata City Hall.
The buses operated during weekdays (working days of the City Hall) stop by at the entrance gate of the Yawata City Hall.
The buses operated during weekdays (working days of the City Hall) stop by at the entrance gate of the Yawata City Hall.

sen.j: 『橋本東山本』停留所は、京阪本線橋本駅 (京都府)より徒歩10分ほどにある住宅地にある。
sen.e: Hashimoto-Higashi Yamamoto' bus stop is situated within the residential area, about 10 minutes away in the walking distance from the train station, Hashimoto Station of the Keihan Main Line. (Kyoto Prefecture)

"Hashimoto-Higashi Yamamoto" bus stop is situated within the residential area, about 10 minutes away in the walking distance from the train station, Hashimoto Station of the Keihan Main Line (Kyoto Prefecture).
sen.cmt: 原文の『』に合せて"を補足しました。ピリオド位置を訂正しました。
sen.e: "Hashimoto-Higashi Yamamoto" bus stop is situated within the residential area, about 10 minutes away in the walking distance from the train station, Hashimoto Station of the Keihan Main Line (Kyoto Prefecture).

sen.j: 『男山雄徳』停留所は、男山車庫から西に100m（信号にして二つ目）の交差点から北に50mほどの位置にある。
sen.e: The bus stop 'Otokoyama Yutoku' is located about 50m north of an intersection, while this intersection is 100m west from the Otokoyama Bus Garage. (two traffic lights away in distance)
The bus stop "Otokoyama Yutoku" is located about 50m north of an intersection, while this intersection is 100m west from the Otokoyama Bus Garage (two traffic lights away in distance).
sen.cmt: 原文の『』に合せて"を補足しました。ピリオド位置を訂正しました。
sen.e: The bus stop "Otokoyama Yutoku" is located about 50m north of an intersection, while this intersection is 100m west from the Otokoyama Bus Garage (two traffic lights away in distance).

sen.j: コミュニティバスやわた
sen.e: The Community Bus Yawata
The Community Bus Yawata
The Community Bus Yawata

sen.j: この経路に使用されているバスは、八幡市が所有している日野・ポンチョの2台と、予備車として京阪バス男山営業所に配備され『送迎などに使用されるバス』として登録されているもの1台（社番503M）が使用されている。
sen.e: The buses being operated for this route are two buses called 'Poncho' by the Hino Motors, Co. Ltd., both owned by Yawata City, while one bus for the substitutional usage (the company registration number of this vehicle is 503M) is stationed at the Keihan Bus Otokoyama Management Office and registered as "the bus for a pick-up service."

The buses being operated for this route are two buses called 'Poncho' by the Hino Motors, Co. Ltd., both owned by Yawata City, while one bus for the substitutional usage (the company registration number of this vehicle is 503M) is stationed at the Keihan Bus Otokoyama Management Office and registered as "the bus for a pick-up service."

The buses being operated for this route are two buses called 'Poncho' by the Hino Motors, Co. Ltd., both owned by Yawata City, while one bus for the substitutional usage (the company registration number of this vehicle is 503M) is stationed at the Keihan Bus Otokoyama Management Office and registered as "the bus for a pick-up service."

sen.j: 八幡市南北線
sen.e: The Yawata City North-South Bus Route
The Yawata City North-South Bus Route
The Yawata City North-South Bus Route

sen.j: 中型車2台(W-3175/W-3179)および中型短尺車3台(W2007/W2008/S-1065)が使用される。
sen.e: This route is under operation with two medium sized buses (W-3175/W-3179) and three medium sized, short length buses. (W2007/W2008/S-1065)
This route is under operation with two medium sized buses (W-3175/W-3179) and three medium sized, short length buses (W2007/W2008/S-1065).
sen.cmt: ピリオド位置を訂正しました。
sen.e: This route is under operation with two medium sized buses (W-3175/W-3179) and three medium sized, short length buses (W2007/W2008/S-1065).

sen.j: この経路に入る場合は前面と側面に1ヶ所ずつヘッドマークを装着する。
sen.e: Those buses running through this bus route are fitted with the symbol marks of the route at the front and the side of their bodies.
Those buses running through this bus route are fitted with the symbol marks of the route at the front and the side of their bodies.
Those buses running through this bus route are fitted with the symbol marks of the route at the front and the side of their bodies.

sen.j: その他
sen.e: Other notes
Other notes
Other notes

sen.j: この経路は、当初は1年間の試験運行とされていたが、現在はその期間を1年延長し、2007年に更に1年延長している。
sen.e: Although the Community Bus Yawata Route was at first established for testing purpose to conduct a real-world evaluation for the period of one year, the operation period of the route was later extended for another year from the first expiration date of the test in 2006, and again another year from the second expiration date of the test in 2007.
sen.cmt: 1. 「この経路」に関してですが、上記「試験運行」との説明があったのは「八幡南北線」のみなのに八幡南北線は2008年からの運行のはずですので、ここでの「この経路」の示す経路は文章から察するのみだと「八幡南北線」であるべきなのですが、それだと時期があわなくなります。「この経路」は「コミュニティバスやわた」を指すと判断しました。2. 「現在はその期間を1年延長し、2007年にさらに一度延長している」と記述されています。ここでいう現在がいつのことかーーこの文ですと2007年より前に文章作成時期を意味する「現在」があったととるしかありません。「コミュニティバスやわた」は2005年開通ですので、1年後の2006年に一度、さらに2007年に一度運用期間が延長されたという意味だと思うのですが、このセルからだけだとパッと見そこまで読み込めません。訳ではわかりやすくなるよう説明を追加しました。
sen.e: Although the Community Bus Yawata Route was at first established for testing purpose to conduct a real-world evaluation for the period of one year, the operation period of the route was later extended for another year from the first expiration date of the test in 2006, and again another year from the second expiration date of the test in 2007.

Although the Community Bus Yawata Route was at first established for testing purpose to conduct a real-world evaluation for the period of one year, the operation period of the route was later extended for another year from the first expiration date of the test in 2006, and again another year from the second expiration date of the test in 2007.

sen.j: しかし、2008年以降も継続して運行している。
sen.e: However, this route is still under operation as of the year 2008.
However, this route is still under operation as of the year 2008.
However, this route is still under operation as of the year 2008.

sen.j: また八幡市南北線と接続するダイヤである。
sen.e: The timetable of the Community Bus Yawata was set up by considering the connection of the route with the Yawata City North-South Bus Route.
The timetable of the Community Bus Yawata was set up by considering the connection of the route with the Yawata City North-South Bus Route.
The timetable of the Community Bus Yawata was set up by considering the connection of the route with the Yawata City North-South Bus Route.
